title: $:/plugins/commons/file-uploads-fission
author: Saq Imtiaz
name: File Uploads: Fission
description: Fission uploader for uploading binary files to external storage
readme:
Fission uploader module for the File Uploads plugin. Saves uploads to Fission's Webnative file system which is based on IPFS.

Meant for use on [[TiddlyWiki on Fission|https://tiddlywiki.fission.app/]]
